short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show DraftKick data in the Yahoo draft room

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get insights for your Yahoo! draft from inside the draft room -- no flipping back and forth to a separate webpage!

- Player valuations based on a custom aggregation of projections
- Recommendations tailored to your league format and your team needs
